sentences.sentence: Objective To investigate the diagnostic value of exercise electrocardiography test (EET).
sentences.translation: 目的评价平板运动试验诊断冠心病的价值。

sentences.sentence: Objective To compare the effect of sotalol and amiodarone on exercise electrocardiography and hemodynamics.
sentences.translation: 目的比较索他洛尔与胺碘酮对运动心电图和血流动力学的影响。

sentences.sentence: Studies of the Relations Between Symptoms and Ambulatory Electrocardiography in the Patients With Atiral Fibrillation.
sentences.translation: 心房颤动患者临床症状与动态心电变化的关系探讨。
